_comment: Configuration parameters for black hole thick-disk shadow imaging
_comment_step_b: Step size for the impact parameter b
_comment_dphi: Step size for the photon orbit azimuthal angle φ (initial φ = 0)
_comment_r_max: Outer radius of the accretion disk used in computations
_comment_b_max: Maximum impact parameter b to trace rays
_comment_kappa_ff: Free-fall coefficient for emitting matter in the disk (range 0-1)
_comment_kappa_K: Rotation coefficient around the z-axis for emitting matter (range 0-0.999)
_comment_r_i: Inner radius of the accretion disk
_comment_theta0_deg: Observer's inclination angle relative to the disk (degrees, 0-90)
_comment_dalpha: Polar angle resolution for image generation (angle interval for emitting traced rays)
_comment_optical_regime: Optical thickness of the disk: can be 'thin', 'thick', or 'intermediate'
_comment_absorption_coefficient: Absorption coefficient used when optical_regime is set to 'intermediate'
_comment_shadow_xmax: Maximum x-axis value when generating black hole images
_comment_shadow_ymax: Maximum y-axis value when generating black hole images
